Package org.thewhitemage13.interfaces

Interface PostServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
PostServiceImpl
public interface PostServiceInterface
Interface for managing posts in the system.

This interface defines the core operations for managing posts, including creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving posts. It also includes methods for verifying post existence, retrieving post URLs, and counting posts for a specific user.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • postVerification

      boolean postVerification(Long postId)
      Verifies whether a post exists based on its ID.

      This method checks if a post with the given postId exists in the system. It returns true if the post is found, otherwise false.

      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to be verified
      Returns:
      true if the post exists, false otherwise

    • createPost

      void createPost(CreatePostDTO createPostDTO)
      Creates a new post based on the provided CreatePostDTO.

      This method processes the data in the CreatePostDTO and creates a new post in the system.

      Parameters:
      createPostDTO - the data transfer object containing the post details

    • updatePost

      void updatePost(Long userId, UpdatePostDTO updatePostDTO) throws PostNotFoundException
      Updates an existing post for the given user.

      This method updates an existing post based on the UpdatePostDTO. It throws a PostNotFoundException if the post to be updated is not found.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user who owns the post
      updatePostDTO - the data transfer object containing the updated post details
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if the post to be updated is not found

    • deletePost

      void deletePost(Long userId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Deletes a post for the given user.

      This method deletes the post associated with the userId. If the post does not exist, a PostNotFoundException will be thrown.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user who owns the post
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if the post to be deleted is not found

    • getPostsByUserId

      List<CreatePostDTO> getPostsByUserId(Long userId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Retrieves all posts associated with a specific user.

      This method returns a list of CreatePostDTO objects representing the posts of the user with the specified userId. It throws a PostNotFoundException if no posts are found.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose posts are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of CreatePostDTO objects representing the user's posts
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if no posts are found for the user

    • getAllPosts

      List<CreatePostDTO> getAllPosts()
      Retrieves all posts in the system.

      This method returns a list of CreatePostDTO objects representing all posts in the system.

      Returns:
      a list of CreatePostDTO objects representing all posts

    • getUserIdByPostId

      Long getUserIdByPostId(Long postId)
      Retrieves the user ID associated with a specific post.

      This method returns the user ID of the owner of the post with the specified postId.

      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post whose user ID is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the user ID of the post owner

    • deleteAllByUserId

      void deleteAllByUserId(Long userId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Deletes all posts associated with a specific user.

      This method deletes all posts for the user with the given userId. It throws a PostNotFoundException if no posts are found for the user.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose posts are to be deleted
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if no posts are found for the user

    • getUrlsByUserId

      List<String> getUrlsByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves all URLs associated with the posts of a specific user.

      This method returns a list of URLs associated with the posts of the user identified by userId.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose post URLs are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of URLs associated with the user's posts

    • getCountPostByUserId

      Integer getCountPostByUserId(Long userId)
      Counts the number of posts created by a specific user.

      This method returns the total number of posts created by the user with the specified userId.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose post count is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the number of posts created by the user

    • openAllPostsByUserId

      List<OpenPostDTO> openAllPostsByUserId(Long userId)
      Retrieves all open posts associated with a specific user.

      This method returns a list of OpenPostDTO objects representing the posts that are open or visible for the user identified by userId.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose open posts are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a list of OpenPostDTO objects representing the user's open posts

    • openPost

      OpenPostDTO openPost(Long postId) throws PostNotFoundException
      Retrieves a specific open post based on its post ID.

      This method returns an OpenPostDTO representing the open post with the specified postId. It throws a PostNotFoundException if the post is not found.

      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an OpenPostDTO representing the open post
      Throws:
      PostNotFoundException - if the post with the specified ID is not found
